channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国科考船在印度洋作业
item.description: China's scientific survey fleet of ships is growing and although the government insists the vessels are for research purposes only, some Asian neighbours, especially India, are concerned sensitive data they gather might be shared with the Chinese military.翻译:中国的科学调查船队正在不断壮大，尽管政府坚称这些船只仅用于研究目的，但一些亚洲邻国，尤其是印度，担心他们收集的敏感数据可能会与中国军方分享。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国商飞在新加坡航展上抢走了空客和波音的风头
item.description: Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC upstaged industry leaders Airbus and Boeing at the Singapore Airshow this week, showing off its self-developed C919 and ARJ21 jets as it pursues international certifications and foreign orders.翻译:中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司本周在新加坡航展上抢走了行业领头羊空客和波音公司的风头，展示了其自主研发的C919和ARJ21喷气式飞机，同时寻求国际认证和外国订单。
item.author: Brenda Goh, Lisa Barrington

item.title: 继 2023 年表现出色后，法国食品集团达能对 2024 年销售充满信心
item.description: French food group Danone said on Thursday it was starting this year with confidence after it delivered 2023 sales growth at the top end of its forecast, and improved its profit margin as higher prices offset lower volumes.翻译:法国食品集团达能周四表示，在 2023 年销售增长达到预期上限后，今年开始充满信心，并因价格上涨抵消了销量下降而提高了利润率。
item.author: Dominique Vidalon

item.title: 中国面临更大的压力，要求采取重大政策来修复经济
item.description: As the annual meeting of China's parliament approaches next month, its leaders are facing the greatest pressure in almost a decade to take bold policy decisions that safeguard the economy's long-term growth potential.翻译:随着下个月中国人大年度会议的临近，中国领导人面临着近十年来最大的压力，需要做出大胆的政策决定，以保障经济的长期增长潜力。
item.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao

item.title: 早盘竞价：英伟达帮助日经指数冲过终点线
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland翻译:凯文·巴克兰 (Kevin Buckland) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国小鹏汽车与阿联酋 Ali&Sons 签署合作伙伴关系，瞄准意大利市场
item.description: China's Xpeng on Thursday said it has established a strategic partnership with UAE-based Ali&Sons and added Italy to its Europe plans, as the electric vehicle maker ramps up overseas expansion.翻译:中国小鹏汽车周四表示，随着这家电动汽车制造商加大海外扩张力度，它已与总部位于阿联酋的 Ali&Sons 建立了战略合作伙伴关系，并将意大利纳入其欧洲计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 驳船撞上中国广州附近的桥梁，导致车辆落水，两人死亡
item.description: Two people were killed after a barge collided with a bridge over a waterway in China's Pearl River Delta near Guangzhou city, causing part of the bridge to break off, plunging vehicles into the water, Chinese state media reported on Thursday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周四报道，一艘驳船与广州市附近中国珠江三角洲水道上的一座桥梁相撞，导致桥梁部分断裂，车辆坠入水中，造成两人死亡。
item.author: Liz Lee, Bernard Orr

item.title: 左撇子：Zara 在快时尚领域对抗 Shein 的秘密武器
item.description: Zara owner Inditex , the world's biggest listed fast fashion company by sales, is expanding its low-priced Gen Z-focused brand Lefties to counter Chinese-founded rival Shein.翻译:Zara 母公司 Inditex 是全球销量最大的快时尚上市公司，该公司正在扩大其专注于 Z 世代的低价品牌 Lefties，以对抗中国创立的竞争对手 Shein。
item.author: Corina Pons, Helen Reid

item.title: 中国调查船访问马尔代夫可能引发印度洋安全担忧
item.description: A Chinese research ship arrived in the Maldives on Thursday, global ship-tracking data showed, just three months after a similar vessel visited the Indian Ocean and sparked New Delhi's security concerns.翻译:全球船舶跟踪数据显示，一艘中国科考船于周四抵达马尔代夫，而就在三个月前，一艘类似的船只访问了印度洋并引发了新德里的安全担忧。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国联想第三季度收入增长超出分析师预期
item.description: China's Lenovo Group , the world's largest maker of personal computers, on Thursday reported October-December revenue of $15.72 billion, up 3% from the same period a year earlier.翻译:全球最大的个人电脑制造商中国联想集团周四公布，10月至12月营收为157.2亿美元，同比增长3%。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 菲律宾海岸警卫队称中国有关入侵的说法“不准确”
item.description: A Philippine coast guard official on Thursday described as "inaccurate" its Chinese counterpart's claim that a fisheries vessel "illegally intruded" into Beijing's waters.翻译:周四，一名菲律宾海岸警卫队官员称，中国同行声称一艘渔船“非法侵入”北京海域的说法“不准确”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 五角大楼表示，美国国务院同意向台湾出售军事装备
item.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale to Taiwan of about $75 million of advanced tactical data link system upgrade planning, the Pentagon said on Wednesday.翻译:五角大楼周三表示，美国国务院已批准向台湾出售价值约 7500 万美元的先进战术数据链系统升级计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达提振亚洲科技股，日本日经指数创历史新高
item.description: Japan's Nikkei share average topped its all-time peak on Thursday, after unexpectedly strong revenue forecasts from U.S. chip designer Nvidia lifted Asian tech stocks.翻译:美国芯片设计公司英伟达出人意料地强劲的收入预测提振了亚洲科技股，日本日经指数周四创下历史新高。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 台总统接见美国代表团：希望今年台美交流更多
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen told a visiting U.S. delegation of lawmakers on Thursday the island hoped to see more Taiwan-U.S. exchanges this year and Taiwan will continue to engage with the world.翻译:台湾总统蔡英文周四对来访的美国议员代表团表示，台湾希望今年能看到更多台美交流，台湾将继续与世界接触。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 主要经济体PMI数据发布前美元下跌
item.description: The dollar edged broadly lower on Thursday as traders awaited a slew of business activity surveys to gauge the health of major economies and what that may mean for the global interest rate outlook.翻译:美元周四全面走低，交易员等待一系列商业活动调查，以评估主要经济体的健康状况及其对全球利率前景的影响。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 中国Z-​​10攻击直升机首次海外亮相，但出口前景不明朗
item.description: China's AVIC displayed its Z-10 attack helicopter for the first time outside its home country at the Singapore Airshow - the only non-Western design on display in a year in which no Russian defence companies were in attendance.翻译:中国航空工业集团公司在新加坡航展上首次在国外展示了Z-10攻击直升机，这是今年没有俄罗斯国防公司参加的唯一一次非西方设计。
item.author: Gerry Doyle

item.title: 外交部长表示，中国认为欧洲对其发展越来越“理性”
item.description: China said it sees Europe as increasingly viewing the country with a "rational perception," and that Europe should "not be afraid of it," Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said.翻译:中国外交部长王毅表示，中国认为欧洲越来越以“理性认知”看待中国，欧洲不应“害怕”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 汇丰成本难题加剧投资者银行审查
item.description: Climbing costs at HSBC have added to growing investor concerns about how big banks manage their expenses, putting executives under pressure to quickly address spending.翻译:汇丰银行成本不断攀升，加剧了投资者对大银行如何管理开支的担忧，使高管面临着迅速解决支出问题的压力。
item.author: Sinead Cruise, Lawrence White

item.title: 中国2023年煤电审批量增加，气候目标面临风险
item.description: China approved another 114 gigawatts (GW) of coal power capacity in 2023, up 10% from a year earlier, with the world's top carbon polluter now at risk of falling short on climate targets after sanctioning dozens of new plants, research showed on Thursday.翻译:周四的研究显示，中国将在 2023 年再批准 114 吉瓦 (GW) 的煤电装机容量，较上年增长 10%，在批准了数十座新电厂后，这个世界最大的碳污染国家现在面临着无法实现气候目标的风险。
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 无论美国大选结果如何，美国国会议员访问台湾都保证支持
item.description: U.S. Representative Mike Gallagher, who chairs the House of Representatives select committee on China, said in Taipei on Thursday that no matter who wins the coming U.S. elections support for Chinese-claimed Taiwan will remain.翻译:众议院中国问题特别委员会主席、美国众议员迈克·加拉格尔周四在台北表示，无论谁赢得即将到来的美国大选，对中国声称拥有主权的台湾的支持都将继续存在。
item.author: Ben Blanchard
